SEARCH
Package Observer

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, RemoteClientImplementation
public interface ViewObserver
This Interface represents the adaptation of the standard Observer Interface to the methods and objects in use inside the Classes that needs to be updated following changes in the View Interface or in its implementations

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onConnectionVerify()
    Method used to verify if the connection with the RemoteServer is still on and running
    void
    onUpdateChat(String Nickname, String chat, String receiver)
    This method notifies to the RemoteClient that a Player wants to write a message in the game chat

    Sends a message to the server with the player number chosen by the user.
    void
    onUpdateSetPlayersList()
    Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the ArrayList containing the Players in the current match

    Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the ArrayList containing the available PlayableItemTile in the LivingRoom

  • Method Details

    • onUpdateNickname

      void onUpdateNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the server with the updated nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to be sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • onUpdatePlayersNumber

      void onUpdatePlayersNumber(int playersNumber) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the server with the player number chosen by the user.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • onUpdateToPickTile

      void onUpdateToPickTile() throws RemoteException
      Tells the RemoteServer that a Player wants to begin picking PlayableItemTiles from the LivingRoom
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateShowLivingRoom

      void onUpdateShowLivingRoom()
      Tells the RemoteClient that a Player wants to see the current situation of the LivingRoom

    • onUpdateShowCurrPlayer

      void onUpdateShowCurrPlayer()
      Tells the RemoteClient that a Player wants to see the nickname of the currPlayer of the match

    • onUpdateShowAvailableTiles

      void onUpdateShowAvailableTiles()
      Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the ArrayList containing the available PlayableItemTile in the LivingRoom

    • onUpdateSetPlayersList

      void onUpdateSetPlayersList()
      Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the ArrayList containing the Players in the current match

    • onUpdateShowPlayerShelf

      void onUpdateShowPlayerShelf(String nickname)
      Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the current situation of the Shelf
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the Player that makes the request

    • onUpdateShowPartialPoint

      int onUpdateShowPartialPoint(String nickname)
      Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has asked to see the current total of the points scored in the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the Player that makes the request

    • onUpdateShowNickCurrPlayer

      void onUpdateShowNickCurrPlayer()
      Informs the RemoteClient that the Player has requested to see the nickname of the currPlayer of the match

    • onUpdateChat

      void onUpdateChat(String Nickname, String chat, String receiver) throws RemoteException
      This method notifies to the RemoteClient that a Player wants to write a message in the game chat
      Parameters:
      Nickname - the nickname of the Player who wants to send the message
      chat - a String representing the actual content of the chat message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onUpdateToStartPutting

      void onUpdateToStartPutting() throws RemoteException
      Tells the RemoteServer that a Player wants to begin putting PlayableItemTiles into the Shelf
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onConnectionVerify

      void onConnectionVerify() throws RemoteException
      Method used to verify if the connection with the RemoteServer is still on and running
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection
